Alla on lista WordPressin versioista aikajärjestyksessä, vanhimmasta uusimpaan. Jokaisen version vieressä on linkki muutoslokiin, josta näkee kunkin version parannukset ja uudet ominaisuudet.

'''NOTE:''' WordPress core developers share a love of jazz music, and all major releases (from 1.0) are named in honor of jazz musicians they admire.

== Planned Versions ==

Based on history, a major release of WordPress happens every 6 months or so.  Suggest and vote on ideas for future releases at [http://wordpress.org/extend/ideas/ the WordPress Extend Ideas site]. Here are the future releases and links to their respective milestones in our [http://trac.wordpress.org/ bug tracker].

{| class="widefat"
|- style="background:#464646; color:#d7d7d7;"
! '''Version'''
! '''Planned Release Date'''
|-
| [[Version 3.1|3.1]]
| [http://trac.wordpress.org/milestone/3.1 Late 2010/early 2011. Planning and development for 3.1 will begin in September 2010.]
|-
| [[Version 3.2|3.2]]
| [http://trac.wordpress.org/milestone/3.2 Sometime in 2011]
|}
